execution_plan.description: Find the gender_code(s) that are least common (have the minimum number of customers).
execution_plan.query: SELECT gender_code FROM (SELECT gender_code, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM customers GROUP BY gender_code) s WHERE cnt = (SELECT MIN(cnt) FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM customers GROUP BY gender_code) sub);

execution_plan.description: Retrieve email address, town_city and county for customers whose gender_code is one of the least common values found in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT email_address, town_city, county, gender_code FROM customers WHERE gender_code IN ($step1.gender_code);
